features: Store snacks and small items in zippered lid pocket
Lash gear to the outside of the pack with side compression straps and daisy chains
Easily secure hiking poles or ice axe on attachment loop
Stay hydrated with reservoir sleeve, drink tube exit port and two side water bottle pockets (hydration reservoir sold separately)
Stay cool with breathable shoulder straps and back panel
Stabilize load with adjustable, removable sternum strap and tuckaway hipbelt
Easily access a phone and other small items in the stretch pocket on shoulder strap
Height x Width x Depth 7.9 x 8.7 x 19.3 in / 20.0 x 22.0 x 49.0 cm
